title: Hi guys Rito Only Corki giving update on oce skin
body:
So after like 3 years thinking about something to represent oceania in a skin we have decided it is literally impossible for any combination of human minds to ever conceive a skin that successfully does this, not even the combined minds of Tesla, Einstein and Hawking could ever create a skin for a region such as OCEANia  therefore we have given up our three year search that has had Riot employees visit many foreign lands and OCEANS searching for answers, it is definitely not because we are lazy and couldn't give a single fk about making a skin that doesn't net maximum profit. We understand that this news will leave all of you saltier then all of the worlds OCEANS combined, but alas, tis a new day, a day where there will be no OCEANia skin, this day will also be followed by days that contain no OCEANia skin. (forever, till no days left)

~ Not really all that sincere Rito Only Corki (The God)

replies.body: They will just sweep it under the rug and wait for everyone to forget.

Why is anyone surprised? Riot won the commercial lottery with League of Legends. The game picked up an enormous following, Riot made tons of cash and now they have an underutilised staff of hipster nerds who wear hoodies and sneakers to work led by an inexperienced management team. The lack of organisation, accountability and foresight will eventually kill League of Legends and, consequently, rito.

I really don't think it's happening tbh,

Especially after the ocean week thing, I have already jumped ship on waiting for this skin.
Maybe there will be a teaser in the Ocean Week reef.
